title: Hour 1: Baker Traded
description:
Dan Orlovsky, Harry Douglas, and Courtney Cronin react to the Browns trading Baker Mayfield to the Panthers. The crew debates if Mayfield can make the Panthers a playoff team. Brian Windhorst stops by to give an update with the Kevin Durant situation in Brooklyn and to discuss the Pelicans' ceiling with a healthy Zion Williamson. T.J Quinn joins the show to give an update regarding Brittney Griner after she pleaded guilty. Courtney and Harry debate if the Big Ten or the SEC has gotten stronger.
